explanation: [0-0] Inside a shopping mall with white flooring, a child stands in the hallway. The child is wearing a red hooded sweatshirt, black pants, a hat, and a white backpack. Their shoes emit a blue-violet light.

[0-3] Next, the camera moves forward with the child, and two adults wearing red hooded sweatshirts and black pants are standing on either side of the hallway, also wearing hats. The person on the left is looking down at their phone, leaning against the silver railing.
